snippet.title: Conviction – An Anthem Trailer From Neill Blomkamp
snippet.description:
From Neill Blomkamp, Oats Studios and BioWare comes a live-action trailer of survival set in the world of Anthem, decades before the events of the game. For more info: http://x.ea.com/56682

Website:      https://www.oatsstudios.com
Twitter:        https://www.twitter.com/oatsstudios/
Instagram:  https://www.instagram.com/oatsstudios/
Facebook:   https://www.facebook.com/oatsstudios/
